title: Poster, 1970–80
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted in blue lower right corner on edge: Konzeption : I.H.Druckrey/M. Maier  Photo: Max Mathys / Entwurf: Inge Druckrey  Photolitho: Wassermann AG Basel
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Extremely large closeup of a color photographic reproduction of a glass of beer fills right side of sheet. The Ganter logo (yellow triangle with stylized eagle's head) visible on glass. The rim of a white plate cuts a semi-circle across the lower one-quarter of sheet. Brown and yellow reflection at left center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1970–80.
1970–80. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-183.
